data.name: Venom
data.description: A symbiotic monstrosity that tears into opponents and spreads harmful effects.

starItems.name: Venom
starItems.description: A symbiotic monstrosity that tears into opponents and spreads harmful effects.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
3.nextUpgrade: Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects into negative effects
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to primary target

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects into negative effects + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects into negative effects + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
This ability costs <color=#86e619>4</color> ability energy instead of <color=#86e619>5</color>

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary target

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>380%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn, <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, and <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>380%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.
6.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, prolong all negative effects on primary target by <color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>380%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn, <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, and <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
> Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>380%</color> damage.
> Prolong all negative effects on primary target by <color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
1.nextUpgrade: Spread <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect, except <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, from the primary target to all adjacent targets

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
Spread <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from the primary target to all adjacent targets. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
Spread <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from the primary target to all adjacent targets. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
3.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Spread <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects, except <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, from the primary target to all adjacent targets

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Spread <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from the primary target to all adjacent targets. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to the primary target and adjacent targets

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Spread <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from the primary target to all adjacent targets. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
5.nextUpgrade: Spread all negative effects, except <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, from the primary target to all adjacent targets

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Spread all negative effects from the primary target to all adjacent targets. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to the primary and adjacent targets
Clear all negative effects from self and the most injured ally

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Spread all negative effects from the primary target to all adjacent targets. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

Clear all negative effects from self and the most injured ally.

This attack cannot be dodged.

1.description:
On Turn, <color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to Heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus if any <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> character is present.

2.description:
On Turn, <color=#86e619>80%</color> chance to Heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus if any <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> character is present.
2.nextUpgrade:
Heal for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health
Always Heal On Turn

3.description:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus if any <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> character is present.
3.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies
When an enemy gains <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self or <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally that does not have <color=#fff568>Counter</color>

4.description:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies.

When an enemy gains <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self or <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally that does not have <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus if any <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> character is present.
4.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed, up to a max of +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Speed
While this character or any <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, those characters gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Chance

5.description:
On Turn:
 > Heal for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed, up to a max of +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Speed.

When an enemy gains <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self or <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally that does not have <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.

While this character or any <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, those characters gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Chance.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus if any <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> character is present.
